pkgmetadata.longdescription: Microsoft Azure CLI 'SQL VM' Command Module===========================================This package is for the 'sql vm' module.i.e. 'az sql vm'.. :changelog:Release History===============0.2.0+++++* Customer can set sql image sku type when creating or updating a sql vm.* Breaking change: --license-type is a required parameter for sql vm create.0.1.1+++++* Minor fixes.0.1.0+++++* Preview release of module.* Deprecates the argument --boostrap-acc-pwd for typo.
